item.title: Compiler Error
item.dc:creator: @DerpaDerpy DerpaDerpy
item.description:
@DerpaDerpy wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("ban")) { try { String playerToBan = playerCommand.substring(4); Connection.addNameToBanList(playerToBan); Connection.addNameToFile(playerToBan); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToBan)) { Server.playerHandler.players[i].disconnected = true; Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; c2.sendMessage(" " +c2.playerName+ " Got Banned By " + c.playerName+ "."); } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }
I cant get this to stop giving me 100 errors…
when ever i remove it i get 0 errors but when its there i get 100
i looked over it and it looked like i have all the braces but idk…
i copied and pasted it from public void administratorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)and trying to paste into public void moderatorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)
but doesnt work
Any help?

Read full topic
